title: Are we still getting the Riot Kayle?
body:
I still have yet to get mine, have gotten the icon tho

Just wondering

replies.body: I checked your account and it looks like you received Riot Kayle pretty early on in the waves that went out. Let me know if you're having trouble using her skin.
They should all be out, have you checked the skins you have unlocked on Kayle?
